ModMetaData.name: Better Traders Guild
ModMetaData.author: Sam Hunt
ModMetaData.description:
Expands interactions with the Traders Guild faction in RimWorld 1.6.
Features: - Visit Traders Guild bases peacefully via shuttle for trading (requires good relations) - Enhanced map generation for Traders Guild bases with high-risk high-reward colony layouts - Give gifts and launch goods via transport pods to gain reputation
Requires the Odyssey DLC
